q: Life is a question and how we live it is our answer.
h:
“Life is a question and how we live it is our answer.” —
Gary Keller

q: A hero is an ordinary person doing things in an extra ordinary way.
h:
“A hero is an ordinary person doing things in an extra ordinary way.” —
Christopher Reeve

q: Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
h:
“Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.” —
Conrad Hilton

q: The only way it gets better for you is when you get better. Better is not something you wish, it's something you become.
h:
“The only way it gets better for you is when you get better. Better is not something you wish, it's something you become.” —
Jim Rohn

q: The world is open for play, everything and everybody is mockable in a wonderful way.
h:
“The world is open for play, everything and everybody is mockable in a wonderful way.” —
Robin Williams

q: I am thankful to all those who said no. It's because of them, I did it myself.
h:
“I am thankful to all those who said no. It's because of them, I did it myself. ” —
Wayne Dyer
